verses.verse: נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֣ר <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar מַלְכָּ֗א <S%H4430><s%> the king לְֽכָל־ <S%H3606><s%> unto all עַֽמְמַיָּ֞א <S%H5972><s%> people אֻמַיָּ֧א <S%H524><s%> nations וְלִשָּׁנַיָּ֛א <S%H3961><s%> and languages דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch [דָאֲרִין כ] (דָיְרִ֥ין <S%H1753><s%> dwell ק) בְּכָל־ <S%H3606><s%> in all אַרְעָ֖א <S%H772><s%> the earth שְׁלָמְכ֥וֹן <S%H8001><s%> Peace יִשְׂגֵּֽא׃ <S%H7680><s%> be multiplied

אָֽתַיָּא֙ <S%H852><s%> the signs וְתִמְהַיָּ֔א <S%H8540><s%> and wonders דִּ֚י <S%H1768><s%> which עֲבַ֣ד <S%H5648><s%> hath wrought עִמִּ֔י <S%H5974><s%> toward אֱלָהָ֖א <S%H426><s%> God [עִלָּיָא כ] (עִלָּאָ֑ה <S%H5943><s%> high ק) שְׁפַ֥ר <S%H8232><s%> it good קָֽדָמַ֖י <S%H6925><s%> I thought לְהַחֲוָיָֽה׃ <S%H2324><s%> to shew

אָת֙וֹהִי֙ <S%H852><s%> [are] his signs כְּמָ֣ה <S%H4101><s%> How רַבְרְבִ֔ין <S%H7260><s%> great וְתִמְה֖וֹהִי <S%H8540><s%> [are] his wonders כְּמָ֣ה <S%H4101><s%> and how תַקִּיפִ֑ין <S%H8624><s%> mighty מַלְכוּתֵהּ֙ <S%H4437><s%> his kingdom מַלְכ֣וּת <S%H4437><s%> kingdom עָלַ֔ם <S%H5957><s%> [is] an everlasting וְשָׁלְטָנֵ֖הּ <S%H7985><s%> and his dominion עִם־ <S%H5974><s%> [is] from דָּ֥ר <S%H1859><s%> generation וְדָֽר׃ <S%H1859><s%> to generation

אֲנָ֣ה <S%H576><s%> I נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֗ר <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar שְׁלֵ֤ה <S%H7954><s%> at rest הֲוֵית֙ <S%H1934><s%> was בְּבֵיתִ֔י <S%H1005><s%> in mine house וְרַעְנַ֖ן <S%H7487><s%> and flourishing בְּהֵיכְלִֽי׃ <S%H1965><s%> in my palace

חֵ֥לֶם <S%H2493><s%> a dream חֲזֵ֖ית <S%H2370><s%> I saw וִֽידַחֲלִנַּ֑נִי <S%H1763><s%> which made me afraid וְהַרְהֹרִין֙ <S%H2031><s%> and the thoughts עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> upon מִשְׁכְּבִ֔י <S%H4903><s%> my bed וְחֶזְוֵ֥י <S%H2376><s%> and the visions רֵאשִׁ֖י <S%H7217><s%> of my head יְבַהֲלֻנַּֽנִי׃ <S%H927><s%> troubled

וּמִנִּי֙ <S%H4481><s%> I שִׂ֣ים <S%H7761><s%> made טְעֵ֔ם <S%H2942><s%> a decree לְהַנְעָלָ֣ה <S%H5954><s%> to bring קָֽדָמַ֔י <S%H6925><s%> before לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3606><s%> in all חַכִּימֵ֣י <S%H2445><s%> the wise בָבֶ֑ל <S%H895><s%> [men] of Babylon דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch פְשַׁ֥ר <S%H6591><s%> unto me the interpretation חֶלְמָ֖א <S%H2493><s%> of the dream יְהֽוֹדְעֻנַּֽנִי׃ <S%H3046><s%> me that they might make known

בֵּאדַ֣יִן <S%H116><s%> Then [עָלֲלִין כ] (עָלִּ֗ין <S%H5954><s%> bring in ק) חַרְטֻמַיָּא֙ <S%H2749><s%> in the magicians אָֽשְׁפַיָּ֔א <S%H826><s%> the astrologers [כַּשְׂדָּיֵא כ] (כַּשְׂדָּאֵ֖י <S%H3779><s%> Chaldean ק) וְגָזְרַיָּ֑א <S%H1505><s%> and the soothsayers וְחֶלְמָ֗א <S%H2493><s%> the dream אָמַ֤ר <S%H560><s%> told אֲנָה֙ <S%H576><s%> and I קֳדָ֣מֵיה֔וֹן <S%H6925><s%> before וּפִשְׁרֵ֖הּ <S%H6591><s%> unto me the interpretation לָא־ <S%H3809><s%> them but they did not מְהוֹדְעִ֥ין <S%H3046><s%> make known לִֽי׃

וְעַ֣ד <S%H5705><s%> But at אָחֳרֵ֡ין <S%H318><s%> the last עַל֩ <S%H5954><s%> came קָֽדָמַ֨י <S%H6925><s%> before me דָּנִיֵּ֜אל <S%H1841><s%> Daniel דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> whose שְׁמֵ֤הּ <S%H8036><s%> whose name בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּר֙ <S%H1096><s%> [was] Belteshazzar כְּשֻׁ֣ם <S%H8036><s%> according to the name אֱלָהִ֔י <S%H426><s%> of my god וְדִ֛י <S%H1768><s%> whom רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7308><s%> and in whom [is] the spirit אֱלָהִ֥ין <S%H426><s%> gods קַדִּישִׁ֖ין <S%H6922><s%> of the holy בֵּ֑הּ וְחֶלְמָ֖א <S%H2493><s%> the dream קָֽדָמ֥וֹהִי <S%H6925><s%> and before אַמְרֵֽת׃ <S%H560><s%> him I told

בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּר֮ <S%H1096><s%> O Belteshazzar רַ֣ב <S%H7229><s%> master חַרְטֻמַיָּא֒ <S%H2749><s%> of the magicians דִּ֣י ׀ <S%H1768><s%> since אֲנָ֣ה <S%H576><s%> because I יִדְעֵ֗ת <S%H3046><s%> know דִּ֠י <S%H1768><s%> which ר֣וּחַ <S%H7308><s%> that the spirit אֱלָהִ֤ין <S%H426><s%> gods קַדִּישִׁין֙ <S%H6922><s%> of the holy בָּ֔ךְ וְכָל־ <S%H3606><s%> all רָ֖ז <S%H7328><s%> secret לָא־ <S%H3809><s%> or even אָנֵ֣ס <S%H598><s%> troubleth לָ֑ךְ חֶזְוֵ֨י <S%H2376><s%> me the visions חֶלְמִ֧י <S%H2493><s%> of my dream דִֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> which חֲזֵ֛ית <S%H2370><s%> that I have seen וּפִשְׁרֵ֖הּ <S%H6591><s%> and the interpretation אֱמַֽר׃ <S%H560><s%> thee tell

וְחֶזְוֵ֥י <S%H2376><s%> Thus [were] the visions רֵאשִׁ֖י <S%H7217><s%> of mine head עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> in מִשְׁכְּבִ֑י <S%H4903><s%> my bed חָזֵ֣ה <S%H2370><s%> was looking הֲוֵ֔ית <S%H1934><s%> become וַאֲל֥וּ <S%H431><s%> and behold אִילָ֛ן <S%H363><s%> a tree בְּג֥וֹא <S%H1459><s%> in the midst אַרְעָ֖א <S%H772><s%> of the earth וְרוּמֵ֥הּ <S%H7314><s%> and the height שַׂגִּֽיא׃ <S%H7690><s%> thereof [was] great

רְבָ֥ה <S%H7236><s%> grew אִֽילָנָ֖א <S%H363><s%> The tree וּתְקִ֑ף <S%H8631><s%> and was strong וְרוּמֵהּ֙ <S%H7314><s%> and the height יִמְטֵ֣א <S%H4291><s%> thereof reached לִשְׁמַיָּ֔א <S%H8065><s%> unto heaven וַחֲזוֹתֵ֖הּ <S%H2379><s%> and the sight לְס֥וֹף <S%H5491><s%> thereof to the end כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> of all אַרְעָֽא׃ <S%H772><s%> the earth

עָפְיֵ֤הּ <S%H6074><s%> The leaves שַׁפִּיר֙ <S%H8209><s%> thereof [were] fair וְאִנְבֵּ֣הּ <S%H4><s%> and the fruit שַׂגִּ֔יא <S%H7690><s%> thereof much וּמָז֨וֹן <S%H4203><s%> and in it [was] meat לְכֹ֖לָּא־ <S%H3606><s%> for all בֵ֑הּ תְּחֹת֜וֹהִי <S%H8460><s%> under תַּטְלֵ֣ל ׀ <S%H2927><s%> had shadow חֵיוַ֣ת <S%H2423><s%> the beasts בָּרָ֗א <S%H1251><s%> of the field וּבְעַנְפ֙וֹהִי֙ <S%H6056><s%> in the boughs [יְדֻרוּן כ] (יְדוּרָן֙ <S%H1753><s%> dwell ק) צִפֲּרֵ֣י <S%H6853><s%> it and the fowls שְׁמַיָּ֔א <S%H8065><s%> of the heaven וּמִנֵּ֖הּ <S%H4481><s%> of it יִתְּזִ֥ין <S%H2110><s%> was fed כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> thereof and all בִּשְׂרָֽא׃ <S%H1321><s%> flesh

חָזֵ֥ה <S%H2370><s%> was looking הֲוֵ֛ית <S%H1934><s%> in בְּחֶזְוֵ֥י <S%H2376><s%> in the visions רֵאשִׁ֖י <S%H7217><s%> of my head עַֽל־ <S%H5922><s%> upon מִשְׁכְּבִ֑י <S%H4903><s%> my bed וַאֲלוּ֙ <S%H431><s%> and behold עִ֣יר <S%H5894><s%> a watcher וְקַדִּ֔ישׁ <S%H6922><s%> and an holy one מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from שְׁמַיָּ֖א <S%H8065><s%> heaven נָחִֽת׃ <S%H5182><s%> came down

קָרֵ֨א <S%H7123><s%> He cried בְחַ֜יִל <S%H2429><s%> aloud וְכֵ֣ן <S%H3652><s%> thus אָמַ֗ר <S%H560><s%> and said גֹּ֤דּוּ <S%H1414><s%> Hew down אִֽילָנָא֙ <S%H363><s%> the tree וְקַצִּ֣צוּ <S%H7113><s%> and cut off עַנְפ֔וֹהִי <S%H6056><s%> his branches אַתַּ֥רוּ <S%H5426><s%> shake off עָפְיֵ֖הּ <S%H6074><s%> his leaves וּבַדַּ֣רוּ <S%H921><s%> and scatter אִנְבֵּ֑הּ <S%H4><s%> his fruit תְּנֻ֤ד <S%H5111><s%> get away חֵֽיוְתָא֙ <S%H2423><s%> let the beasts מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from תַּחְתּ֔וֹהִי <S%H8479><s%> under it וְצִפְּרַיָּ֖א <S%H6853><s%> and the fowls מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from עַנְפֽוֹהִי׃ <S%H6056><s%> his branches

בְּרַ֨ם <S%H1297><s%> Nevertheless עִקַּ֤ר <S%H6136><s%> the stump שָׁרְשׁ֙וֹהִי֙ <S%H8330><s%> of his roots בְּאַרְעָ֣א <S%H772><s%> in the earth שְׁבֻ֔קוּ <S%H7662><s%> leave וּבֶֽאֱסוּר֙ <S%H613><s%> even with a band דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch פַרְזֶ֣ל <S%H6523><s%> of iron וּנְחָ֔שׁ <S%H5174><s%> and brass בְּדִתְאָ֖א <S%H1883><s%> in the tender grass דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch בָרָ֑א <S%H1251><s%> of the field וּבְטַ֤ל <S%H2920><s%> with the dew שְׁמַיָּא֙ <S%H8065><s%> of heaven יִצְטַבַּ֔ע <S%H6647><s%> and let it be wet וְעִם־ <S%H5974><s%> [be] with חֵיוְתָ֥א <S%H2423><s%> the beasts חֲלָקֵ֖הּ <S%H2508><s%> and [let] his portion בַּעֲשַׂ֥ב <S%H6211><s%> in the grass אַרְעָֽא׃ <S%H772><s%> of the earth

לִבְבֵהּ֙ <S%H3825><s%> Let his heart מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from [אֱנֹושָׁא כ] (אֲנָשָׁ֣א <S%H606><s%> man ק) יְשַׁנּ֔וֹן <S%H8133><s%> be changed וּלְבַ֥ב <S%H3825><s%> heart חֵיוָ֖ה <S%H2423><s%> and let a beast's יִתְיְהִ֣ב <S%H3052><s%> be given לֵ֑הּ וְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7655><s%> unto him and let seven עִדָּנִ֖ין <S%H5732><s%> times יַחְלְפ֥וּן <S%H2499><s%> pass עֲלֽוֹהִי׃ <S%H5922><s%> over

בִּגְזֵרַ֤ת <S%H1510><s%> [is] by the decree עִירִין֙ <S%H5894><s%> of the watchers פִּתְגָמָ֔א <S%H6600><s%> This matter וּמֵאמַ֥ר <S%H3983><s%> by the word קַדִּישִׁ֖ין <S%H6922><s%> of the holy ones שְׁאֵֽלְתָ֑א <S%H7595><s%> and the demand עַד־ <S%H5705><s%> to דִּבְרַ֡ת <S%H1701><s%> the intent דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch יִנְדְּע֣וּן <S%H3046><s%> may know חַ֠יַּיָּא <S%H2417><s%> that the living דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch שַׁלִּ֨יט <S%H7990><s%> ruleth [עִלָּיָא כ] (עִלָּאָ֜ה <S%H5943><s%> high ק) בְּמַלְכ֣וּת <S%H4437><s%> in the kingdom [אֱנֹושָׁא כ] (אֲנָשָׁ֗א <S%H606><s%> of mankind ק) וּלְמַן־ <S%H4479><s%> it to whomsoever דִּ֤י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch יִצְבֵּא֙ <S%H6634><s%> he will יִתְּנִנַּ֔הּ <S%H5415><s%> and giveth וּשְׁפַ֥ל <S%H8215><s%> it the basest אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H606><s%> of men יְקִ֥ים <S%H6966><s%> and setteth up [עֲלַיַּהּ כ] (עֲלַֽהּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and ק)

דְּנָה֙ <S%H1836><s%> This חֶלְמָ֣א <S%H2493><s%> dream חֲזֵ֔ית <S%H2370><s%> have seen אֲנָ֖ה <S%H576><s%> I מַלְכָּ֣א <S%H4430><s%> king נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֑ר <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar [וְאַנְתָּה כ] (וְאַ֨נְתְּ <S%H607><s%> as for thee ק) בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּ֜ר <S%H1096><s%> O Belteshazzar פִּשְׁרֵ֣א ׀ <S%H6591><s%> the interpretation אֱמַ֗ר <S%H560><s%> declare כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> all קֳבֵל֙ <S%H6903><s%> thereof forasmuch as דִּ֣י ׀ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch כָּל־ <S%H3606><s%> all חַכִּימֵ֣י <S%H2445><s%> the wise מַלְכוּתִ֗י <S%H4437><s%> [men] of my kingdom לָֽא־ <S%H3809><s%> are not יָכְלִ֤ין <S%H3202><s%> able פִּשְׁרָא֙ <S%H6591><s%> unto me the interpretation לְהוֹדָ֣עֻתַ֔נִי <S%H3046><s%> to make known [וְאַנְתָּה כ] (וְאַ֣נְתְּ <S%H607><s%> as for thee ק) כָּהֵ֔ל <S%H3546><s%> [art] able דִּ֛י <S%H1768><s%> for רֽוּחַ־ <S%H7308><s%> for the spirit אֱלָהִ֥ין <S%H426><s%> gods קַדִּישִׁ֖ין <S%H6922><s%> of the holy בָּֽךְ׃

אֱדַ֨יִן <S%H116><s%> Then דָּֽנִיֵּ֜אל <S%H1841><s%> Daniel דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> whose שְׁמֵ֣הּ <S%H8036><s%> whose name בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּ֗ר <S%H1096><s%> [was] Belteshazzar אֶשְׁתּוֹמַם֙ <S%H8075><s%> was astonied כְּשָׁעָ֣ה <S%H8160><s%> hour חֲדָ֔ה <S%H2298><s%> for one וְרַעְיֹנֹ֖הִי <S%H7476><s%> and his thoughts יְבַהֲלֻנֵּ֑הּ <S%H927><s%> troubled עָנֵ֨ה <S%H6032><s%> spake מַלְכָּ֜א <S%H4430><s%> him The king וְאָמַ֗ר <S%H560><s%> and said בֵּלְטְשַׁאצַּר֙ <S%H1096><s%> Belteshazzar חֶלְמָ֤א <S%H2493><s%> the dream וּפִשְׁרֵא֙ <S%H6591><s%> or the interpretation אַֽל־ <S%H409><s%> let not יְבַהֲלָ֔ךְ <S%H927><s%> thereof trouble עָנֵ֤ה <S%H6032><s%> answered בֵלְטְשַׁאצַּר֙ <S%H1096><s%> thee Belteshazzar וְאָמַ֔ר <S%H560><s%> and said [מָרְאִי כ] (מָרִ֕י <S%H4756><s%> lord ק) חֶלְמָ֥א <S%H2493><s%> the dream [לְשָׂנְאַיִךְ כ] (לְשָֽׂנְאָ֖ךְ <S%H8131><s%> hate ק) וּפִשְׁרֵ֥הּ <S%H6591><s%> thee and the interpretation [לְעָרַיִךְ כ] (לְעָרָֽךְ <S%H6146><s%> enemy ק)

אִֽילָנָא֙ <S%H363><s%> The tree דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> which חֲזַ֔יְתָ <S%H2370><s%> that thou sawest דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> which רְבָ֖ה <S%H7236><s%> which grew וּתְקִ֑ף <S%H8631><s%> and was strong וְרוּמֵהּ֙ <S%H7314><s%> whose height יִמְטֵ֣א <S%H4291><s%> reached לִשְׁמַיָּ֔א <S%H8065><s%> unto the heaven וַחֲזוֹתֵ֖הּ <S%H2379><s%> and the sight לְכָל־ <S%H3606><s%> thereof to all אַרְעָֽא׃ <S%H772><s%> the earth

וְעָפְיֵ֤הּ <S%H6074><s%> Whose leaves שַׁפִּיר֙ <S%H8209><s%> [were] fair וְאִנְבֵּ֣הּ <S%H4><s%> and the fruit שַׂגִּ֔יא <S%H7690><s%> thereof much וּמָז֨וֹן <S%H4203><s%> and in it [was] meat לְכֹ֖לָּא־ <S%H3606><s%> for all בֵ֑הּ תְּחֹת֗וֹהִי <S%H8460><s%> under תְּדוּר֙ <S%H1753><s%> dwelt חֵיוַ֣ת <S%H2423><s%> which the beasts בָּרָ֔א <S%H1251><s%> of the field וּבְעַנְפ֕וֹהִי <S%H6056><s%> and upon whose branches יִשְׁכְּנָ֖ן <S%H7932><s%> had their habitation צִפֲּרֵ֥י <S%H6853><s%> the fowls שְׁמַיָּֽא׃ <S%H8065><s%> of the heaven

[אַנְתָּה כ] (אַנְתְּ־ <S%H607><s%> It thou ה֣וּא <S%H607><s%> It [is] thou ק) מַלְכָּ֔א <S%H4430><s%> O king דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch רְבַ֖ית <S%H7236><s%> that art grown וּתְקֵ֑פְתְּ <S%H8631><s%> and become strong וּרְבוּתָ֤ךְ <S%H7238><s%> for thy greatness רְבָת֙ <S%H7236><s%> is grown וּמְטָ֣ת <S%H4291><s%> and reacheth לִשְׁמַיָּ֔א <S%H8065><s%> unto heaven וְשָׁלְטָנָ֖ךְ <S%H7985><s%> and thy dominion לְס֥וֹף <S%H5491><s%> to the end אַרְעָֽא׃ <S%H772><s%> of the earth

וְדִ֣י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch חֲזָ֣ה <S%H2370><s%> saw מַלְכָּ֡א <S%H4430><s%> And whereas the king עִ֣יר <S%H5894><s%> a watcher וְקַדִּ֣ישׁ <S%H6922><s%> and an holy one נָחִ֣ת ׀ <S%H5182><s%> coming down מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from שְׁמַיָּ֡א <S%H8065><s%> heaven וְאָמַר֩ <S%H560><s%> and saying גֹּ֨דּוּ <S%H1414><s%> down אִֽילָנָ֜א <S%H363><s%> the tree וְחַבְּל֗וּהִי <S%H2255><s%> and destroy בְּרַ֨ם <S%H1297><s%> it yet עִקַּ֤ר <S%H6136><s%> the stump שָׁרְשׁ֙וֹהִי֙ <S%H8330><s%> of the roots בְּאַרְעָ֣א <S%H772><s%> thereof in the earth שְׁבֻ֔קוּ <S%H7662><s%> leave וּבֶאֱסוּר֙ <S%H613><s%> even with a band דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch פַרְזֶ֣ל <S%H6523><s%> of iron וּנְחָ֔שׁ <S%H5174><s%> and brass בְּדִתְאָ֖א <S%H1883><s%> in the tender grass דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch בָרָ֑א <S%H1251><s%> of the field וּבְטַ֧ל <S%H2920><s%> with the dew שְׁמַיָּ֣א <S%H8065><s%> of heaven יִצְטַבַּ֗ע <S%H6647><s%> and let it be wet וְעִם־ <S%H5974><s%> [be] with חֵיוַ֤ת <S%H2423><s%> the beasts בָּרָא֙ <S%H1251><s%> of the field חֲלָקֵ֔הּ <S%H2508><s%> and [let] his portion עַ֛ד <S%H5705><s%> till דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch שִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7655><s%> seven עִדָּנִ֖ין <S%H5732><s%> times יַחְלְפ֥וּן <S%H2499><s%> pass עֲלֽוֹהִי׃ <S%H5922><s%> over

דְּנָ֥ה <S%H1836><s%> This פִשְׁרָ֖א <S%H6591><s%> [is] the interpretation מַלְכָּ֑א <S%H4430><s%> O king וּגְזֵרַ֤ת <S%H1510><s%> [is] the decree [עִלָּיָא כ] (עִלָּאָה֙ <S%H5943><s%> high ק) הִ֔יא <S%H1932><s%> and this דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> which מְטָ֖ת <S%H4291><s%> which is come עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> upon [מַרְאִי כ] (מָרִ֥י <S%H4756><s%> lord ק) מַלְכָּֽא׃ <S%H4430><s%> the king

וְלָ֣ךְ טָֽרְדִ֣ין <S%H2957><s%> That they shall drive מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> thee from אֲנָשָׁ֡א <S%H606><s%> men וְעִם־ <S%H5974><s%> with חֵיוַ֣ת <S%H2423><s%> the beasts בָּרָא֩ <S%H1251><s%> of the field לֶהֱוֵ֨ה <S%H1934><s%> shall be מְדֹרָ֜ךְ <S%H4070><s%> and thy dwelling וְעִשְׂבָּ֥א <S%H6211><s%> grass כְתוֹרִ֣ין ׀ <S%H8450><s%> as oxen לָ֣ךְ יְטַֽעֲמ֗וּן <S%H2939><s%> and they shall make thee to eat וּמִטַּ֤ל <S%H2920><s%> thee with the dew שְׁמַיָּא֙ <S%H8065><s%> of heaven לָ֣ךְ מְצַבְּעִ֔ין <S%H6647><s%> and they shall wet וְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7655><s%> and seven עִדָּנִ֖ין <S%H5732><s%> times יַחְלְפ֣וּן <S%H2499><s%> shall pass [עֲלַיִךְ כ] (עֲלָ֑ךְ <S%H5921><s%> and ק) עַ֣ד <S%H5705><s%> thee till דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch תִנְדַּ֗ע <S%H3046><s%> thou know דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch שַׁלִּ֤יט <S%H7990><s%> ruleth [עִלָּיָא כ] (עִלָּאָה֙ <S%H5943><s%> high ק) בְּמַלְכ֣וּת <S%H4437><s%> in the kingdom אֲנָשָׁ֔א <S%H606><s%> of men וּלְמַן־ <S%H4479><s%> it to whomsoever דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch יִצְבֵּ֖א <S%H6634><s%> he will יִתְּנִנַּֽהּ׃ <S%H5415><s%> and giveth

וְדִ֣י <S%H1768><s%> that it was אֲמַ֗רוּ <S%H560><s%> And whereas they commanded לְמִשְׁבַּ֞ק <S%H7662><s%> to leave עִקַּ֤ר <S%H6136><s%> the stump שָׁרְשׁ֙וֹהִי֙ <S%H8330><s%> roots דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch אִֽילָנָ֔א <S%H363><s%> of the tree מַלְכוּתָ֖ךְ <S%H4437><s%> thy kingdom לָ֣ךְ קַיָּמָ֑ה <S%H7011><s%> shall be sure מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> unto thee after דִּ֣י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch תִנְדַּ֔ע <S%H3046><s%> that thou shalt have known דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch שַׁלִּטִ֖ן <S%H7990><s%> do rule שְׁמַיָּֽא׃ <S%H8065><s%> that the heavens

לָהֵ֣ן <S%H3861><s%> Wherefore מַלְכָּ֗א <S%H4430><s%> O king מִלְכִּי֙ <S%H4431><s%> let my counsel יִשְׁפַּ֣ר <S%H8232><s%> be acceptable [עֲלַיִךְ כ] (עֲלָ֔ךְ <S%H5921><s%> and ק) [וַחֲטָיָךְ כ] (וַחֲטָאָךְ֙ <S%H2408><s%> sin ק) בְּצִדְקָ֣ה <S%H6665><s%> by righteousness פְרֻ֔ק <S%H6562><s%> and break off וַעֲוָיָתָ֖ךְ <S%H5758><s%> and thine iniquities בְּמִחַ֣ן <S%H2604><s%> by shewing mercy עֲנָ֑יִן <S%H6033><s%> to the poor הֵ֛ן <S%H2006><s%> if תֶּהֱוֵ֥א <S%H1934><s%> it may be אַרְכָ֖ה <S%H754><s%> a lengthening לִשְׁלֵוְתָֽךְ׃ <S%H7963><s%> of thy tranquillity
כֹּ֣לָּא <S%H3606><s%> All מְּטָ֔א <S%H4291><s%> this came עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> upon נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֖ר <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar מַלְכָּֽא׃ <S%H4430><s%> the king פ

לִקְצָ֥ת <S%H7118><s%> At the end יַרְחִ֖ין <S%H3393><s%> months תְּרֵֽי־ <S%H8648><s%> second עֲשַׂ֑ר <S%H6236><s%> ten עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> in הֵיכַ֧ל <S%H1965><s%> the palace מַלְכוּתָ֛א <S%H4437><s%> of the kingdom דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch בָבֶ֖ל <S%H895><s%> of Babylon מְהַלֵּ֥ךְ <S%H1981><s%> was walking הֲוָֽה׃ <S%H1934><s%> become

עָנֵ֤ה <S%H6032><s%> spake מַלְכָּא֙ <S%H4430><s%> The king וְאָמַ֔ר <S%H560><s%> and said הֲלָ֥א <S%H3809><s%> Is not דָא־ <S%H1668><s%> is this הִ֖יא <S%H1932><s%> not בָּבֶ֣ל <S%H895><s%> Babylon רַבְּתָ֑א <S%H7229><s%> great דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> which אֲנָ֤ה <S%H576><s%> that I בֱנַיְתַהּ֙ <S%H1124><s%> have built לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1005><s%> for the house מַלְכ֔וּ <S%H4437><s%> of the kingdom בִּתְקַ֥ף <S%H8632><s%> by the might חִסְנִ֖י <S%H2632><s%> of my power וְלִיקָ֥ר <S%H3367><s%> and for the honour הַדְרִֽי׃ <S%H1923><s%> honour

ע֗וֹד <S%H5751><s%> While מִלְּתָא֙ <S%H4406><s%> the word בְּפֻ֣ם <S%H6433><s%> mouth מַלְכָּ֔א <S%H4430><s%> [was] in the king's קָ֖ל <S%H7032><s%> a voice מִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from שְׁמַיָּ֣א <S%H8065><s%> heaven נְפַ֑ל <S%H5308><s%> there fell לָ֤ךְ אָֽמְרִין֙ <S%H560><s%> to thee it is spoken נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֣ר <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar מַלְכָּ֔א <S%H4430><s%> [saying] O king מַלְכוּתָ֖ה <S%H4437><s%> The kingdom עֲדָ֥ת <S%H5709><s%> is departed מִנָּֽךְ׃ <S%H4481><s%> from

וּמִן־ <S%H4481><s%> thee from אֲנָשָׁא֩ <S%H606><s%> men לָ֨ךְ טָֽרְדִ֜ין <S%H2957><s%> And they shall drive וְֽעִם־ <S%H5974><s%> [shall be] with חֵיוַ֧ת <S%H2423><s%> the beasts בָּרָ֣א <S%H1251><s%> of the field מְדֹרָ֗ךְ <S%H4070><s%> and thy dwelling עִשְׂבָּ֤א <S%H6211><s%> grass כְתוֹרִין֙ <S%H8450><s%> as oxen לָ֣ךְ יְטַעֲמ֔וּן <S%H2939><s%> they shall make thee to eat וְשִׁבְעָ֥ה <S%H7655><s%> and seven עִדָּנִ֖ין <S%H5732><s%> times יַחְלְפ֣וּן <S%H2499><s%> shall pass [עֲלַיִךְ כ] (עֲלָ֑ךְ <S%H5921><s%> and ק) עַ֣ד <S%H5705><s%> thee until דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch תִנְדַּ֗ע <S%H3046><s%> thou know דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch שַׁלִּ֤יט <S%H7990><s%> ruleth [עִלָּיָא כ] (עִלָּאָה֙ <S%H5943><s%> high ק) בְּמַלְכ֣וּת <S%H4437><s%> in the kingdom אֲנָשָׁ֔א <S%H606><s%> of men וּלְמַן־ <S%H4479><s%> it to whomsoever דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch יִצְבֵּ֖א <S%H6634><s%> he will יִתְּנִנַּֽהּ׃ <S%H5415><s%> and giveth

בַּהּ־ שַׁעֲתָ֗א <S%H8160><s%> The same hour מִלְּתָא֮ <S%H4406><s%> was the thing סָ֣פַת <S%H5487><s%> fulfilled עַל־ <S%H5922><s%> upon נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּר֒ <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar וּמִן־ <S%H4481><s%> from אֲנָשָׁ֣א <S%H606><s%> men טְרִ֔יד <S%H2957><s%> and he was driven וְעִשְׂבָּ֤א <S%H6211><s%> grass כְתוֹרִין֙ <S%H8450><s%> as oxen יֵאכֻ֔ל <S%H399><s%> and did eat וּמִטַּ֥ל <S%H2920><s%> with the dew שְׁמַיָּ֖א <S%H8065><s%> of heaven גִּשְׁמֵ֣הּ <S%H1655><s%> and his body יִצְטַבַּ֑ע <S%H6647><s%> was wet עַ֣ד <S%H5705><s%> till דִּ֥י <S%H1768><s%> forasmuch שַׂעְרֵ֛הּ <S%H8177><s%> his hairs כְּנִשְׁרִ֥ין <S%H5403><s%> like eagles' רְבָ֖ה <S%H7236><s%> were grown וְטִפְר֥וֹהִי <S%H2953><s%> [feathers] and his nails כְצִפְּרִֽין׃ <S%H6853><s%> like birds'

וְלִקְצָ֣ת <S%H7118><s%> And at the end יֽוֹמַיָּה֩ <S%H3118><s%> of the days אֲנָ֨ה <S%H576><s%> I נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֜ר <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar עַיְנַ֣י ׀ <S%H5870><s%> mine eyes לִשְׁמַיָּ֣א <S%H8065><s%> unto heaven נִטְלֵ֗ת <S%H5191><s%> lifted up וּמַנְדְּעִי֙ <S%H4486><s%> and mine understanding עֲלַ֣י <S%H5922><s%> unto me יְת֔וּב <S%H8421><s%> returned [וּלְעִלָּיָא כ] (וּלְעִלָּאָה֙ <S%H5943><s%> high ק) בָּרְכֵ֔ת <S%H1289><s%> and I blessed וּלְחַ֥י <S%H2417><s%> him that liveth עָלְמָ֖א <S%H5957><s%> for ever שַׁבְּחֵ֣ת <S%H7624><s%> and I praised וְהַדְּרֵ֑ת <S%H1922><s%> and honoured דִּ֤י <S%H1768><s%> For שָׁלְטָנֵהּ֙ <S%H7985><s%> whose dominion שָׁלְטָ֣ן <S%H7985><s%> dominion עָלַ֔ם <S%H5957><s%> [is] an everlasting וּמַלְכוּתֵ֖הּ <S%H4437><s%> and his kingdom עִם־ <S%H5974><s%> [is] from דָּ֥ר <S%H1859><s%> generation וְדָֽר׃ <S%H1859><s%> to generation

וְכָל־ <S%H3606><s%> And all [דָּאֲרֵי כ] (דָּיְרֵ֤י <S%H1753><s%> dwell ק) אַרְעָא֙ <S%H772><s%> of the earth כְּלָ֣ה <S%H3809><s%> as nothing חֲשִׁיבִ֔ין <S%H2804><s%> [are] reputed וּֽכְמִצְבְּיֵ֗הּ <S%H6634><s%> according to his will עָבֵד֙ <S%H5648><s%> and he doeth בְּחֵ֣יל <S%H2429><s%> in the army שְׁמַיָּ֔א <S%H8065><s%> of heaven [וְדָאֲרֵי כ] (וְדָיְרֵ֖י <S%H1753><s%> dwell ק) אַרְעָ֑א <S%H772><s%> of the earth וְלָ֤א <S%H3809><s%> and none אִיתַי֙ <S%H383><s%> can דִּֽי־ <S%H1768><s%> can יְמַחֵ֣א <S%H4223><s%> stay בִידֵ֔הּ <S%H3028><s%> his hand וְיֵ֥אמַר <S%H560><s%> or say לֵ֖הּ מָ֥ה <S%H4101><s%> unto him What עֲבַֽדְתְּ׃ <S%H5648><s%> doest

בֵּהּ־ זִמְנָ֞א <S%H2166><s%> At the same time מַנְדְּעִ֣י ׀ <S%H4486><s%> my reason יְת֣וּב <S%H8421><s%> returned עֲלַ֗י <S%H5922><s%> unto me וְלִיקַ֨ר <S%H3367><s%> and for the glory מַלְכוּתִ֜י <S%H4437><s%> of my kingdom הַדְרִ֤י <S%H1923><s%> mine honour וְזִוִי֙ <S%H2122><s%> and brightness יְת֣וּב <S%H8421><s%> returned עֲלַ֔י <S%H5922><s%> unto me וְלִ֕י הַדָּֽבְרַ֥י <S%H1907><s%> and my counsellors וְרַבְרְבָנַ֖י <S%H7261><s%> and my lords יְבַע֑וֹן <S%H1156><s%> sought וְעַל־ <S%H5922><s%> unto me מַלְכוּתִ֣י <S%H4437><s%> in my kingdom הָתְקְנַ֔ת <S%H8627><s%> and I was established וּרְב֥וּ <S%H7238><s%> majesty יַתִּירָ֖ה <S%H3493><s%> and excellent ה֥וּסְפַת <S%H3255><s%> was added לִֽי׃

כְּעַ֞ן <S%H3705><s%> Now אֲנָ֣ה <S%H576><s%> I נְבוּכַדְנֶצַּ֗ר <S%H5020><s%> Nebuchadnezzar מְשַׁבַּ֨ח <S%H7624><s%> praise וּמְרוֹמֵ֤ם <S%H7313><s%> and extol וּמְהַדַּר֙ <S%H1922><s%> and honour לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4430><s%> the King שְׁמַיָּ֔א <S%H8065><s%> of heaven דִּ֤י <S%H1768><s%> who כָל־ <S%H3606><s%> all מַעֲבָד֙וֹהִי֙ <S%H4567><s%> whose works קְשֹׁ֔ט <S%H7187><s%> [are] truth וְאֹרְחָתֵ֖הּ <S%H735><s%> and his ways דִּ֑ין <S%H1780><s%> judgment וְדִי֙ <S%H1768><s%> who מַהְלְכִ֣ין <S%H1981><s%> and those that walk בְּגֵוָ֔ה <S%H1467><s%> in pride יָכִ֖ל <S%H3202><s%> he is able לְהַשְׁפָּלָֽה׃ <S%H8214><s%> to abase פ
